subject: throttle spring burst
description_text:
hello, i just wanted to contact you guys because i was letting one of my
friends use my sim and when i got on next the throttle pedal’s spring was
split in half. when i went to look for a replacement part all i could find
was a kit with everything for about 40$ and i wanted to ask if maybe i
could get a replacement for just the throttle spring (for the original
pedals not the upgraded ones yall released) if thats not an option id be
happy to custom order the spring if possible or something like that i just
cant justify spending 40 usd on a throttle spring thank you regardless ive
had these pedals for a long time and theyre wonderful id love to keep using
them as soon as possible!

conversations.body_text: Hi Ryan Goldsholl,     Please provide your order number, pedal model, and a photo of the broken spring. We will arrange a free replacement for you.

the order number is
114-4988323-1645806
and im not sure what the model number is but its the one with the 130kg
load cell brake pedal and no bearings on the joints
